name: Bluerabbit Global LLC
description: Developer of a digital application designed to create micro-social networks to foster communities in physical places. The company's application makes people interact within and between universities and provides a public feed where they can share stuff and ask questions to the community to increase community collaboration, enabling students to communicate better within their university.
one_liner: Developer of a digital application designed to create micro-social networks to foster communities in physical places. The company's application makes people interact within and between universities and provides a public feed where they can share stuff and ask questions to the community to increase community collaboration, enabling students to communicate better within their university.
